description: We found Jake in a bar, he actually just strutted over and started to chat to us - it was like the lamb coming up to the lions. As you might have guessed, it wasn't long until he was convinced to come back to the apartment for what he thought was a few more drinks (he was in for a surprise). After the crew restrained Jake, they covered him with a group jerk while Sebastion decided it would be entertaining to watch a little porn, but not in just the conventional way.
title: Jake Smith & Sebastian Kane
